pr_title: MINOR: more compatibility tests, minor refactoring

timeline.message: MINOR: more compatibility tests, minor refactoring

timeline.bodyText: Nit: maybe "Detect removed maximum number schema" is a better description here.
timeline.author: dragosvictor
dragosvictor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -124,6 +182,35 @@

   },

+    "update_schema": {
+      "type": "number",
+      "maximum": 10
+    },
+    "changes": [
+      "MAXIMUM_DECREASED #/maximum"
+    ],
+    "compatible": false
+  },
+  {
